edu.bu.segrelab.comets
Interface CometsConstants

All Known Implementing Classes:
Cell, Comets, CometsMenuBar, CometsParameters, CometsRunPanel, CometsSetupPanel
public interface CometsConstants

A handy way to avoid having to write CometsConstants.XXXXX over and over throughout the program - just have most of the classes implement this.

Most of these are situation- and class-specific. But they should be pretty straightforward in where they oughta be used.

Author:
Bill Riehl
